org.jclouds.cloudstack
Interface CloudStackGlobalApi

All Superinterfaces:
CloudStackApi, CloudStackDomainApi
Deprecated. The *Api classes will be replaced with the *Api classes in jclouds 1.7. 

@Deprecated
public interface CloudStackGlobalApi
extends CloudStackDomainApi

Provides synchronous access to CloudStack.

Author:
Adrian Cole
See Also:
CloudStackDomainAsyncApi,
